name: clevertap-expo-plugin
description: The CleverTap expo plugin enables integration of the CleverTap SDK into your Expo projects, to leverage CleverTap's features in your React Native applications.

scripts.build: yarn run lint && rm -rf build && tsc && cp -a support/serviceExtensionFiles build/support/ && cp -a support/contentExtensionFiles build/support/

author: Clevertap
